message: You can't have it all, let's be realistic!
You're being greedy, meet me in the middle!
You're getting closer, but I still want more!
I'm not getting taken advantage of, meet me halfway!
You're getting closer to the middle, but I'm still in control!
You're being stubborn, but I'm willing to compromise!
You're getting close to the bottom, better make it worth my while!
This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
You're running out of time, but I'm not backing down!
This is my last chance, meet me at the middle!
This is my last stand, take it or nothing!
